A solar-powered snoring device that uses the sun's energy to create a gentle hum that helps individuals fall asleep.
A mobile app that tracks and analyzes an individual's snoring patterns, and provides personalized recommendations for improving sleep quality.
A snoring mask that uses LED lights to stimulate the release of melatonin, a hormone that regulates sleep, and helps individuals fall asleep faster.
A smart pillow that uses sensors to detect and analyze an individual's snoring patterns, and provides personalized feedback on how to improve sleep quality.
A wearable device that tracks an individual's snoring patterns and provides real-time feedback on how to adjust their sleeping position to reduce snoring.
